attributes.action: Stuart Hall is reported to have been helped to procure under age sex by BBC staff members.  Put them all under investigation.
attributes.additional_details: There are far too many compelling reports about criminal activity by BBC personnel over the sex abuse scandals coming to notice nowadays.  Why are they not being investigated and put on trial for their criminal activity - COULD IT BE THAT THEY ARE BEING PROTECTED BY THEIR FRIENDS IN GOVERNMENT IN THE SAME WAY THEY PROTECTED THE PERPETRATORS OF THE SEX CRIMES IN THE PAST?

rejection.details: The investigation of specific individuals is an operational policing matter.
